mapper.select: select ci.*,gk.gk_index,gk.gk_year,gk.gk_num,gk.doc_no,gk.gk_file, gk.generate_dtime,gk.effect_dtime, gk.aboli_dtime,gk.topic_id,gk.topic_name,gk.theme_id,gk.theme_name,gk.serve_id, gk.serve_name,gk.topic_key,gk.place_key,gk.language,gk.carrier_type,gk.gk_validity, gk.gk_format,gk.gk_way,gk.gk_type,gk.gk_no_reason,gk.gk_time_limit , gk.gk_range,gk.gk_proc,gk.gk_duty_dept,gk.gk_input_dept,gk.file_head,gk.gk_signer, ty.info_id,ty.gk_fwlb,ty.gk_bsjg,ty.gk_sxyj,ty.gk_bldx,ty.gk_bltj,ty.gk_blsx,ty.gk_bllc, ty.gk_gsfs,ty.gk_blshixian,ty.gk_sfbz,ty.gk_sfyj,ty.gk_zxqd,ty.gk_bgsj,ty.gk_cclx, ty.gk_jgwz,ty.gk_jdjc,ty.gk_zrzj,ty.gk_wszx,ty.gk_wsbl,ty.gk_ztcx,ty.gk_wsts,ty.gk_memo from cs_info ci,cs_gk_info gk,cs_gk_f_bszn ty where ci.info_id=#{info_id} and ci.info_id = gk.info_id and gk.info_id = ty.info_id
mapper.update: update cs_gk_f_bszn set gk_fwlb = #{gk_fwlb}, gk_bsjg = #{gk_bsjg}, gk_sxyj = #{gk_sxyj}, gk_bldx = #{gk_bldx}, gk_bltj = #{gk_bltj}, gk_blsx = #{gk_blsx}, gk_bllc = #{gk_bllc}, gk_gsfs = #{gk_gsfs}, gk_blshixian = #{gk_blshixian}, gk_sfbz = #{gk_sfbz}, gk_sfyj = #{gk_sfyj}, gk_zxqd = #{gk_zxqd}, gk_bgsj = #{gk_bgsj}, gk_cclx = #{gk_cclx}, gk_jgwz = #{gk_jgwz}, gk_jdjc = #{gk_jdjc}, gk_zrzj = #{gk_zrzj}, gk_wszx = #{gk_wszx}, gk_wsbl = #{gk_wsbl}, gk_ztcx = #{gk_ztcx}, gk_wsts = #{gk_wsts}, gk_memo = #{gk_memo} where info_id = #{info_id}
mapper.delete: delete from cs_gk_f_bszn where info_id in (${info_ids})
